title: Are these allegations about the effectiveness of the face mask true?
subtitle: Since the summer of 2020, which allegedly refers to the Center for Disease Control and the Department of Occupational Safety and Health of the United States, joint jobs have made numerous claims but there is little evidence.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: It is true that the Facebook article states that N95 masks, surgical masks and fabric masks can be dangerous and/or ineffective in protecting against the spread of COVID-19 based on CDC and the guidelines for the United States Occupational Safety and Health Department.
